admin_authorized_keys.description: SSH public authorized key(s) for the admin user

root_authorized_keys.description: SSH public authorized key(s) for the root user

root_ssh_rsa.description: private SSH rsa key for root user

root_ssh_rsa_pub.description: public SSH rsa key for root user (mostly not required)

pkgsrc.description: if pkgsrc set, pkgsrc_base do nothing, replace pkgin pkgsrc full in file /opt/local/etc/pkgin/repositories.conf and /opt/local/etc/pkg_install.conf

pkgsrc_base.description: only action when pkgsrc not set, replace pkgin pkgsrc https://pkgsrc.joyent.com in file /opt/local/etc/pkgin/repositories.conf and /opt/local/etc/pkg_install.conf
